Art Projects: Clothespins can be used as a paintbrush holder or an interesting frame for a small art project, such as a collage.
Photo Organization: Clothespins can be used to attach photos to a wall for a photo display or to organize and hang photos.
Plant Markers: Clothespins can be used as plant markers by attaching small labels with the plant name to the clothespins and placing them in the soil near each plant.
Craft Tool Holder: Clothespins can be used as a small tool holder for keeping small craft supplies organized.
Bookmarks: Clothespins can be used as a bookmark by attaching a small piece of paper to the clothespin and inserting it into a book to mark your place.
